definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: Under the match of dark set, once one day inside sweep two records of counties.
sentences.chinese: 在暗組的配合下，曾有一天之內橫掃兩個縣的記錄。

sentences.english: And Swipe-to-Reveal feels a little stale.
Visible in these photos are the sweep of the roofline and the stubby rear deck.
sentences.chinese: 看到這些照片是橫掃車頂和短後甲板。

sentences.english: This time around, he swept to the title in imperious style.
sentences.chinese: 而這一次，他橫掃賽場一舉奪冠。

sentences.english: It looks like (Hurricane) Katrina went through the store.
sentences.chinese: 感覺就像卡特里納颶風橫掃過店鋪。
反法的抗議橫掃整個國家。

sentences.english: She cracks her bow down on the skull of one of the wolves.
sentences.chinese: 她用弓橫掃，打在一隻狼的腦袋上。

sentences.english: He broke the habit of a lifetime yesterday when he congratulated them for thrashing Real Madrid but quickly reverted to type.
sentences.chinese: 昨天他破了一會例，讚揚他們將皇馬橫掃出局。

sentences.english: So like I mentioned above, this colour has been all over the runways.
sentences.chinese: 就像我上面所說的那樣，駝色已經橫掃了所有T臺。

sentences.english: When lonely feelings chill the meadows of your mind.
sentences.chinese: 當孤零寒冷的感覺橫掃着你思緒的牧場。

sentences.english: It swept through England in the summer of 1348.
They really kicked butt in the last Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 她們在上一屆奧運真的是橫掃千軍。

sentences.english: "It is crazy to think all those trophies could be won, " Charlton said.
sentences.chinese: “設想橫掃所有的5項冠軍是很瘋狂的，”查爾頓說。

sentences.english: We're trying to fix the interaction between Sweeping Strikes and Bladestorm.
sentences.chinese: 我們正嘗試修正橫掃攻擊和劍刃風暴之間的關係。

sentences.english: Suppose a wind is blowing from the Gulf of Mexico northward across the southeast United States.
sentences.chinese: 一股風正從墨西哥灣向北吹，橫掃美國西南部。

sentences.english: Where's the dignity in that when they're going to be steamrolled by the Celtics or Pistons?
sentences.chinese: 被凱爾特人或者活塞橫掃有什麼尊嚴可言呢？

definition: a move/an action/in one move/at a stroke/in one go
special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
to be a big hit/to be hugely popular
to be popular/to be in luck/to have good luck/to develop smoothly
to defend the crown (in sports championship)
to seize the crown/fig. to win a championship/to win gold medal
to engulf/to sweep/to carry away everything
